strings.title: Arena Loon Shooter ðŸ”¥
strings.desktop_instructions1: Shoot your balloon to a matching loon!
strings.desktop_instructions2: Score points by shooting balloons or each other
strings.desktop_instructions3: Use WASD keys to move and Spacebar to shoot!
strings.mobile_instructions1: Shoot your balloon to a matching loon!
strings.mobile_instructions2: Score points by shooting balloons or each other
strings.mobile_instructions3: Touch to move and click shoot to shoot!

fields.name: Font Family
fields.description: Google fonts link to font to use in the game

fields.name: Game Title
fields.description: The title that is displayed in the start menu

fields.name: Default Room Name
fields.description: Default room name that appears in the main menu.

fields.name: Default Player Name
fields.description: Default player name that appears in the main menu.

fields.name: Max Connections per Shard
fields.description: Maximum possible number of players allowed to join one room.

fields.name: Starting Lives
fields.description: How many lives you initially have

fields.name: Arena Size
fields.description: How big is the playable arena?

fields.name: Bullet Speed
fields.description: How fast will all bullets travel?

fields.name: Maximum Collectibles
fields.description: How many weapon collectibles are there at one time? Bigger numbers might negatively impact performance.

fields.name: Minimum Score to Save
fields.description: Minimum score needed for user to save his/her name in Leaderboard.

fields.name: Maximum Game Messages
fields.description: Limit the number of game messages here.

fields.name: Game Message Duration
fields.description: Duration of each message in seconds.

fields.name: Emojis
fields.description: Include up to 5 emojis from https://getemoji.com/ for player communication!

fields.name: Enable Cursor
fields.description: Do you want the game to have cursor when game starts?

fields.name: Enable Game Timer
fields.description: Disable if you don't want game to have a timer.

fields.name: Game Timer
fields.description: How many seconds before game should over?

fields.name: Play Button Text
fields.description: Label on the Play Button

fields.name: Leaderboard Button Text
fields.description: Label on the Leaderboard Button

fields.name: Change Character
fields.description: Label on the Change Character Button

fields.name: Enable E-Mail Input
fields.description: Enable/Disable E-Mail input while submitting score.

fields.name: Main Menu Background Size
fields.description: Empty for tiled background. Use CSS background-size properties only. Eg. cover
